t: We Spent Six Months Testing Robotic Pool Cleaners—These Are the Best Cleaners to Keep Your Pool Sparkling
s: We spent six months testing robotic pool cleaners in our pools at home, evaluating them on their setup, design, ease of use, and effectiveness. After putting 24 different models to the test, we chose the top nine options to keep your pool sparkling clean.

t: We’re Keeping Our Pools Crystal Clear This Summer With These Top Tested Robot Pool Cleaners
